derivation: a primitive root (identical with through the idea of sloping); properly, to bend downward; but used only as a denominative from H6203 (עֹרֶף),
outline: 1. (Qal) to break the neck (of an animal)
kjv_def: that is beheaded, break down, break (cut off, strike off) neck.
strongs_def: to break the neck; hence (figuratively) to destroy
